channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1445; 06:59PM; 6745 N Farmdale Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/44RpDZ6; #NorthHollywood; The first 50 firefighters extinguished the flames in 26 minutes. One approximately 40-year-old patient was located and is receiving a medical assessment by paramedics on scene. Cause under investigation.; FS 89; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC10 BC14 BC5 CE84 CM40 CM42 E102 E227 E239 E260 E278 E288 E289 E60 E7 E77 E88 E89 EA1 EM14 HR3 RA889 RA89 T27 T39 T60 T78 T88 T89 UR27 UR88; CH8; 17 18; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1445; 06:33PM; 6745 N Farmdale Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/44RpDZ6; #NorthHollywood; Two-story commercial building with fire showing.; FS 89; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC14 E239 E260 E289 E60 E7 E77 E89 RA889 RA89 T39 T60 T89; CH9; 17; Nicholas Prange

Update Chemical Investigation; INC#0489; 10:30AM; 9332 N De Soto Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Kid5BK; #Chatsworth; LAFD Hazmat teams concluded their investigation. The odor has dissipated and all readings are normal. The previously-smelled substance was not able to be identified, but is no longer a hazard. All readings were within normal limits. The building has been deemed safe to inhabit, and all evacuees are able to re-enter the building. A total of two adult patients were transported with medical complaints (unknown if they were connected to the odor). No further hazard.; FS 96; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; AP7 BC15 CM40 CM42 E287 E296 EM14 EM15 EM17 JT3 RA106 RA107 RA70 RA828 RA87 RA898 RA90 RA96 SQ87 T87; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

Chemical Investigation; INC#0489; 09:07AM; 9332 N De Soto Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Kid5BK; #Chatsworth; LAFD is on scene of a two-story commercial building, with an odor from an unknown chemical. LAFD Hazardous Materials specialists are responding to investigate the source of the odor. Approximately 100 people have been evacuated from the building, and only four of those have been identified with complaints. Paramedics are assessing the four patients, and currently only one hospital transport has been ordered. No widespread or escalating hazard. MOTORISTS: Seek alternate routes, as De Soto Avenue will be impacted near Prairie Street.; FS 96; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC15 E287 E296 EM14 EM15 EM17 JT3 RA107 RA70 RA828 RA87 RA898 RA96 SQ87 T87; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

Update Structure Fire; INC#0276; 07:15AM; 1265 N Lyman Pl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3YdfvY0; #EastHollywood; After extinguishing the flames, firefighters performed another (more thorough) search and found one patient inside the first floor of the structure, who was transported to the hospital in critical condition. A second patient (adult female) came forward with a medical emergency, and was transported to a local hospital. One firefighter was transported for non-life-threatening burn injuries. Per protocol, LAFD Arson Investigators are responding to conduct a fire-cause investigation.; FS 35; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; AR1 BC5 CM52 E20 E220 E235 E35 E6 EM11 PH1 RA35 RA6 RA835 T20 T35; CH7; 12; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0276; 06:39AM; 1265 N Lyman Pl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3YdfvY0; #EastHollywood; It took 32 firefighters 17 minutes to access, confine, and extinguish the flames on the first floor of a two-story duplex. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 35; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; BC5 CM52 E20 E220 E235 E35 E6 EM11 RA35 RA6 RA835 T20 T35; CH9; 12; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0276; 06:22AM; 1265 N Lyman Pl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3YdfvY0; #EastHollywood; Two-story duplex with heavy fire showing. Offensive mode.; FS 35; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; BC5 E20 E220 E235 E35 E6 EM11 RA35 RA6 RA835 T20 T35; CH9; 12; Nicholas Prange

Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#1526; 09:19PM; 1037 W 67th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Oz4cGC; #VermontSlauson; 24 LAFD Firefighters took less than 13 minutes to access, confine and extinguish heavy flames within an 800 square foot one-story home at the rear of the property. No injury. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 57; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 E233 E266 E33 E66 RA64 T33 T66; CH9; 12; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#1526; 09:06PM; 1037 W 67th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Oz4cGC; #VermontSlauson; PRELIM: Small one-story home at the rear of the property well involved with fire.; FS 57; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 E233 E266 E33 E66 RA64 T33 T66; CH9; 12; Brian Humphrey

Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#1217; 04:38PM; 10650 N Nassau Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3KfNVDV; #Sunland; *Address Corrected From Mather Avenue*. First arriving 22 LAFD personnel confined flames to a detached garage at the rear of the property in just 18 minutes. No injury. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 74; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; AR1 BC12 BC14 E24 E274 E289 E298 E77 E91 EM14 RA74 RA77 RA874 T74 T89 T98; CH8; 18; Brian Humphrey
